response.original_title: A Relationship Kept in The Dark
response.overview: In A Relationship Kept in The Dark movie, renowned photographer Jane falls for rookie model Hector, unaware he's the heir to a business empire. Hector hides his identity to win her heart, but jealousy and misunderstandings drive them apart. When Jane’s life falls apart, Hector steps in secretly to help—and later reveals his true self with a grand gesture of love and a proposal.
response.title: A Relationship Kept in The Dark
